Instruction: Add corn and beans to the pot; simmer for an additional 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste, then serve hot.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste before serving.

While that is happening, bring 2 1/2 cups of water to a boil. Stir in the couscous, cover, and take it off the heat. Allow it to sit for 5 to 7 minutes. Fluff it with a fork and serve topped with vegetables.
